document.masterDocTitle: An actualized catalogue of the Psychodidae (Diptera) of Mexico and their known distribution by state

heading.emphasis: Species of Psychodidae by Mexican state

subSubSection.paragraph:
Aguascalientes
. With no records.

Baja California
(3 species).
Micropygomyia ( Coquillettimyia ) stewarti
,
Maruina ( Maruina ) lanceolata
, Stupkaiella birama .

. With no records.
